title: National Basketball Association all-time minutes leaders 1946 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of minutes played for 30 number of NBA players.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The minimum NBA player Bill Russell has got 1.41 times less Number of minutes played than the maximum NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.
min_summary: This bar chart has 30 columns on the x axis representing NBA player, and Number of minutes played in each NBA player on the y axis.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of minutes played for 30 number of NBA players.
The Number of minutes played is highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of minutes played for 30 number of NBA players.
The Number of minutes played is appeared to be the highest at NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar and lowest at NBA player Bill Russell.
The highest NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has 16720.0 more Number of minutes played than the lowest NBA player Bill Russell.
The NBA player Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has the highest Number of minutes played, followed by Karl Malone, and Dirk Nowitzki. Down to the NBA player Bill Russell which is the lowest.
The NBA player Bill Russell tends to be 1.24 percent lower than average.
The Number of minutes played is 1389368.0 if we add up values of all NBA players.
